text: WYAP-LP is a Variety formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Clay, West Virginia, serving Central Clay County, West Virginia. WYAP-LP is owned and operated by Clay County Communications, Ltd. ==See also== *List of community radio stations in the United States ==References== ==External links== * Yap Radio Online * Category:2004 establishments in West Virginia Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 2004 YAP-LP YAP-LP Category:Community radio stations in the United States
title: WYAP-LP
